page.title: 17Belstead Brook Hotel cont.
page.content: The only quiet times are the first two weeks in January and the first two weeks in August. Apart from that business is very steady, really. We do not have many children staying -only a few at week-ends, and, of course, more at Christmas. Downing Primary School. Note: Belstead Brook Hotel is a privately owned establishment and is one of two hotels in the area. The other is owned by Trust House Forte, a national chain of hotels. Belstead Brook is a small tributary of the River Orwell. Belstead is a nucleated settlement, which has become a dormitory village for Ipswich and now has no shop, public house or primary school. Its name has been adopted by Lord Belstead, former Under-Secretary of State for Education. Ed.
